style.style: The understated design of this classic baseball neck bomber jacket makes it the perfect choice for casual days. It's cut to a roomy regular fit to make layering up easy and it's lined for extra comfort. The polished metal zip fastens securely against the elements, and our water-repellent Stormwear™ finish keeps you dry during light rain showers. The stretchy ribbed trims are super-snug, too. Two concealed snap pockets store your personal items safely. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

Composition: 100% polyester (exclusive of trimmings) , Lining - 100% polyester , Ribbing - 98% polyester, 2% elastane
